message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $20,000 is out of my price range. I'm interested in this product, but I can only offer $8,000. It's the maximum I'm willing to spend.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider coming down to $17,000. This is my final offer.
